headline: Satellos Appoints Antoinette Paone as Chief Development Officer and Head of Regulatory Affairs
summary: TORONTO, January 29, 2026--Satellos Bioscience Inc. (TSX: MSCL, OTCQB: MSCLF) ("Satellos" or the "Company"), a clinical-stage biotechnology company developing life-improving medicines to treat degenerative muscle diseases, today announced the appointment of Antoinette Paone as Chief Development Officer ("CDO") and Head of Regulatory Affairs. Ms. Paone brings extensive experience leading regulatory strategy from clinical development through approval, including her work on Kalydeco and Orkambi at

content.title: Satellos Appoints Antoinette Paone as Chief Development Officer and Head of Regulatory Affairs
content.summary: TORONTO, January 29, 2026--Satellos Bioscience Inc. (TSX: MSCL, OTCQB: MSCLF) ("Satellos" or the "Company"), a clinical-stage biotechnology company developing life-improving medicines to treat degenerative muscle diseases, today announced the appointment of Antoinette Paone as Chief Development Officer ("CDO") and Head of Regulatory Affairs. Ms. Paone brings extensive experience leading regulatory strategy from clinical development through approval, including her work on Kalydeco and Orkambi at
